name: Star Map

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/04-Character Classes - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

entries.result: A scroll bearing depictions of constellations
A stone tablet with fine holes drilled through it
An owlbear hide tooled with stellar symbols
A collection of maps bound in an ebony cover
A crystal engraved with starry patterns
A glass disk etched with constellations

notes: Roll 1d6 or choose a form when creating the Star Map.
